name: School Management System Software
short_description:
GBC Smart school management system is simple administration software, easy to use school administration system that helps schools to automate various critical operations like Admission, Billing, Performance, Attendance, Timetable, Payroll, Inventory, Library management, Accounts Management, ID card, and TC etc.

With the advantage of internet and mobile communication, Schools need to ensure that real time information is shared with all parents / teachers in the most effective manner. This is feasible only with optimized process management using Smart School Management System.
summary: School Management System Software in Chennai, School  ERP in India
